name: WordPress Page to Zendesk Article
author: Vitaly Uvarov

sections.description:
You can create an Article in Zendesk and say WordPress to sync this article content from WordPress post/page.
Each time you update this WordPress’s page/post it will automatically update the article in Zendesk.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp_to_zendesk directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->General Page to configure the plugin

short_description: Wordpress Page/Post to Zendesk Article Synchronization Plugin
description:
You can create an Article in Zendesk and say WordPress to sync this article content from WordPress post/page.
Each time you update this WordPress’s page/post it will automatically update the article in Zendesk.
